name: McDropper
description:
McDropper

With Covid-19 surging again, the mayor has decided to put the town into lockdown. You have been tasked by the mayor to deliver food items to the town people.

Controls:

Drone Movement:

WASD and Arrow keys

Pick Up/Drop:

Left Mouse Click

Open Map;

TAB

NOTE: Sometimes drone movement gets bugged when there is an object attached to it. Simply drop and pick up the item again to fix it.
